name: Ace of Space (WarKiwiStudios)
description:
A retro-style short shmup. This game is my first game ever made in Unity, so please be gentle! Don't hesitate to send bugs to pablo at warkiwistudios.com (please, if sending a bug, be sure to include as much information as possible including screenshots, how to replicate the error, steps taken, etc.).

Thank you, and enjoy!

//VERSION 0.1 - ALPHA
